import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Form, Button, Col, Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import axios from '../../axios-orders'; function SelectionFrom({showForm, name, kayaks, time, route, value, submit, back }) { let selectionForm = null if (showForm){ selectionForm = (

{route} on {value.format('dddd')}, {value.format("MMMM Do YYYY")}

 Name Number of Kayaks Pick Up Location Start Time {/* */}
);} else { selectionForm = (null) }; return (
{selectionForm}
) } export default SelectionFrom;
